name: projects/1017425675889/locations/europe-west3/instances/a099fd02-80fc-4a0f-a80c-fb5d7fe78564/rules/ru_6c6c4e48-b835-468f-b002-03aaf5864b68
text:
rule Default_Admin_account_Credential_Exposure {

  meta:
    // Allows for storage of arbitrary key-value pairs of rule details -
    author = "TCS Cloud MDR COE team"
    description = "Default_Admin_account_Credential_Exposure"
    severity = "High"
    type = "alert"
    mitre_attack_tactic = "Privilege escalation"
    mitre_attack_technique = "Valid accounts"

  events:
    $e.metadata.product_name = "Windows"
    $e.metadata.product_event_type= "6416"
    $e.metadata.description = "Logon Type:10" or $e.metadata.description = "Logon Type:2"
    $e.principal.user.userid = "Administrator" or $e.principal.user.userid ="Admin" or $e.principal.user.userid="Guest" 
    
  outcome:
    
    $risk_score = 60

  condition:
    $e
}
author: TCS Cloud MDR COE team
